channel.title: Speechotes Manuals on
channel.description: Recent content in Speechotes Manuals on

item.title: Dictation Quick Start
item.description: Quick Start # Go to here Click the mic Approve microphone Start dictating Optional - select a different dictation language Upgrade here Demo video # Detailed Instructions # Pre-operation: # Connect a high-quality microphone to your PC (if you have a built-in microphone it might be good enough). Operation: # Click the mic For the first time only: Your browser will popup a request for you to allow the site to listen to your mic.

item.title: Transcription Quick Start
item.description: Short Demo # See Real Life Examples # For a quick overview of how Speechnotes Transcribe works, you can see some real life examples of transcriptions done by Speechnotes. Here are some samples Start & Sign In # Go to Speechnotes Transcribe web page at https://speechnotes.co/transcribe/ Tap the 'SIGN IN' and sign in using your Google account. No need to remember new passwords. Speechnotes will not receive your password - it remains private - it only receives your email address and confirmation from Google that indeed you signed in.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: General # We at Speechnotes, Speechlogger, TextHear, Speechkeys value your privacy, and that's why we do not store anything you say or type or in fact any other data about you - unless it is solely needed for the purpose of your operation. We don't share it with 3rd parties, other than Google / Microsoft for the speech-to-text engine. Handling recordings and results # - Transcription service # Our transcription service is probably the most private and secure transcription service available.
